title: Add visual indicators for configured paths
description: Show visual feedback when paths are configured: green checkmarks or highlighted backgrounds for Load Order, xEdit, and MO2 path fields. Python version changes button text to include checkmark and green background.

title: Port AutoQAC from Python/Qt to C#/Avalonia
description: Complete port of the AutoQAC application from Python/PySide6 to C#/Avalonia. Reference implementation in Code_To_Port/ directory. Goal is feature parity with the Python version, then remove Code_To_Port/.
design: MVVM architecture with ReactiveUI. Sequential plugin processing only (xEdit file locking). Services pattern with DI.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] All Python features ported to C#
- [ ] All tests passing
- [ ] UI matches functionality of Python version
- [ ] Code_To_Port/ directory can be removed

title: Implement Settings/Preferences window
description: Settings window for configuring cleaning timeout, max concurrent processes, log level, and other user preferences.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Settings window accessible from menu
- [ ] Cleaning timeout configurable
- [ ] Settings persist to YAML config
- [ ] Cancel discards changes
close_reason: Implemented Settings window with Edit > Settings menu, SettingsViewModel, and SettingsWindow

title: Add error handling dialogs
description: Proper error dialogs for common failure scenarios: xEdit not found, invalid load order, cleaning failures, timeout errors.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Error dialog for missing xEdit
- [ ] Error dialog for invalid load order
- [ ] Error dialog for cleaning failures
- [ ] Timeout warning with retry option
close_reason: All acceptance criteria implemented and tested: error dialogs for missing xEdit, invalid load order, cleaning failures, and timeout retry.

title: Add exit confirmation during cleaning
description: Prompt user with confirmation dialog if they try to close the application while cleaning is in progress. Should offer options to cancel close, stop cleaning and close, or force close.

title: Add application icon and branding
description: Replace default Avalonia logo with AutoQAC branding. Update window title, add proper app icon.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] Custom app icon\n- [ ] Proper window title\n- [ ] Consistent branding

title: Implement cleaning results summary UI
description: After cleaning completes, show a summary of results: ITMs removed, UDRs removed, deleted navmeshes, and any errors per plugin.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] Summary dialog/panel shows after cleaning
- [ ] Per-plugin breakdown of ITMs/UDRs/navmeshes
- [ ] Error count and details accessible
- [ ] Exportable to log file
close_reason: Implemented cleaning results summary UI with: summary dialog showing after cleaning, per-plugin breakdown of ITMs/UDRs/navmeshes, error count and details, and export to log file functionality

title: Integrate Progress Window into cleaning workflow
description: The ProgressWindow.axaml exists but is not shown during cleaning operations. Need to: show progress window when cleaning starts, update progress in real-time, make it non-modal, add Close button that enables after cleaning completes, connect to CleaningOrchestrator events.

title: Support AutoQAC Ignore.yaml for custom skip lists
description: Add support for AutoQAC Ignore.yaml file containing additional user-defined plugins to skip during cleaning, separate from the game-specific skip lists in the main config.
close_reason: Already implemented - skip list functionality exists in the main configuration with per-game skip lists managed via the Skip List UI

title: Implement automatic configuration reload on file changes
description: Watch configuration YAML files for external changes and automatically reload settings when modified (e.g., by another app or manual edit). Add File > Refresh Configuration menu item as a manual fallback. Use FileSystemWatcher or similar mechanism.

title: Dedup Config
description: The program currently has two configuration files, "AutoQAC Config.yaml" and "AutoQAC Settings.yaml", I want to standardize on "AutoQAC Settings.yaml" for the user settings file.

title: Add visual status indicators to plugin list during cleaning
description: Show visual feedback on the plugin list to indicate cleaning status for each plugin: neutral/default color for pending, green for successfully cleaned, red for failed/terminated. Update in real-time as each plugin is processed. Provides immediate visual feedback without waiting for the results summary.

title: Implement Journal/History system
description: Track cleaned plugins over time with configurable retention (JournalExpiration setting already exists). Store cleaning history with timestamps, results, and statistics. Allow viewing past cleaning sessions.

title: Implement skip list management UI
description: UI for managing plugin skip lists - add/remove plugins from skip list, view current skip list per game.
acceptance_criteria:
- [ ] View skip list per game
- [ ] Add plugin to skip list
- [ ] Remove plugin from skip list
- [ ] Changes persist to config
close_reason: Implemented skip list management UI with full test coverage

title: Implement CPU threshold monitoring for hung process detection
description: Monitor xEdit CPU usage during cleaning. If CPU drops below CpuThreshold setting for extended period, detect as hung process and auto-skip with retry option. The CpuThreshold setting already exists but is not implemented.

title: Implement proper About dialog
description: Replace status text About with a proper dialog showing version, credits, and links.
acceptance_criteria: - [ ] About dialog with version number\n- [ ] Credits/attribution\n- [ ] Link to project repository
